div.div: Variations of community composition change rate, SlnÎ», during the study periods for DBR and BCI.
div.p: The solid lines are based on the true values and the dashed lines are based on the fitted values. (a) Community I in DBR, (b) Community II in DBR, (c) Community I in DBR with adjusted intervals, (d) Community II in DBR with adjusted intervals, and (e) BCI.
